name: nk.pl minimized
description:
Bez:
- reklam,
- śledzika,
- prezentów,
- komercji, 
- ostatnio wstawionych na nk.pl zdjęć,
- ostatnio wstawionych na nk.pl filmów,
- wpisów z bloga.
css:
/* mod by sager */
@-moz-document domain('nk.pl'){

  body, #home {
   background: #87C03A !important;
  }

  .profile_box {
    margin-top:0 !important;
  }

  #page {
    margin:0 auto !important;
  }

  #user_list_menu,
  #sledzik_box,
  #quick_sledzik_toggle,
  #sledzik_toggle_button,
  #sledzik_friends div.button_bar,
  #page_menu_main > ul > li:nth-child(2),
  #page_menu_znajomi > ul > li:nth-child(7),
  #page_menu_znajomi > ul > li:nth-child(8),
  #promoted_gifts_box,
  #contest_box,
  #blog_promo_link,
  #billboard_place,
  #td_flash,
  #blog_entries,
  #adserver_prefetch_code,
  #content_banner,
  #ObjectSMP,
  #promo_entry,
  #user_description,
  #regular_mail_view > *,
  #content_boxes > a[target="_blank"],
  #content_boxes > center,
  #content_boxes > object,
  #content_boxes > ins,
  #main_anonymous_left_column > center,
  #main_anonymous_right_column ins,
  #rectangle_place,
  #regular_mail_view > div,
  a[href="/payment"],
  a[href="/wrzuta"],
  a[href*="adclick"],
  a.allegro_link,
  div[id^="oas_place"],
  div.reklama,
  div.text_ad,
  div.flash_ad,
  div.ad_placement,
  div.partners_box,
  div.email_remainder_popup,
  div.nk_popup_overlay,
  div.promoted_accounts,
  div.prezenty,
  div.profile_applications_box_color,
  div.last_photos_box,
  div.last_added_videos,
  div.avatar_sledzik,
  div.only_unknow_followers,
  div.applications_tools,
  div.main_column_right a[target="_blank"],
  div.partners_box > div.banners,
  div#last_events_box + br + center,
  td.profile_buttons > div.ikonki:nth-child(7) {
    display:none !important;
  }

}
